title: Emre Can - Wikipedia
snippet: A season later, he was signed by Premier League club Liverpool for £9.75 million where he made over 150 appearances across all tiers of competition and would join Juventus in 2018. In 2020 he was loaned to Borussia Dortmund; a few weeks later he moved to the team under a permanent deal.

title: Emre Can joins Borussia Dortmund on a permanent basis - Juventus
snippet: Turin, 18 February 2020 - Juventus ... the obligation for the definitive acquisition of the registration rights of the player Emre Can by Borussia Dortmund GmbH & Co. KGaA became due for a consideration of € 25 million, to be paid in three financial years...

title: Emre Can: Borussia Dortmund complete permanent transfer with Juventus | Football News | Sky Sports
snippet: Borussia Dortmund have signed Emre Can on a four-year deal after activating an option to make the midfielder's loan from Juventus permanent. Can has made just three appearances since joining the Bundesliga side on January 31, but the Germany ...

title: Emre Can: Midfielder Completes Move To Borussia Dortmund As Juventus Nightmare Ends
snippet: Dortmund confirmed the transfer in a statement: "Borussia Dortmund has signed German international Emre Can from Italian champions Juventus Turin with immediate effect.

title: Emre Can Ends Juventus Nightmare With $25 Million Borussia Dortmund Transfer.
snippet: Emre Can Ends Juventus Nightmare With $25 Million Borussia Dortmund Transfer.
